rows.label: bf03110100_0010
rows.name: Helluva story.

rows.label: bf03110100_0020
rows.name:
So you headed to the World Tree to reach
Eden, but got swallowed up whole instead?

rows.label: bf03110100_0030
rows.name: You got some crazy luck.

rows.label: bf03110100_0040
rows.name: So, er, what were you doing back there, then?

rows.label: bf03110100_0050
rows.name:
Y'know, this Divine Beast...
It ain't too fussy about what it eats.

rows.label: bf03110100_0060
rows.name:
I went down there to see if anything we
might need in the village washed up.

rows.label: bf03110100_0070
rows.name: But mostly I only found your sorry mushes.

rows.label: bf03110100_0080
rows.name: Yeah, sorry about that...

rows.label: bf03110100_0090
rows.name:
Here we are.
Welcome to Hr√¶svelgr. Ain't much but it's home.

rows.label: bf03110100_0100
rows.name: The village has a lot of children.

rows.label: bf03110100_0110
rows.name: Lots of Drivers and Blades here too!

rows.label: bf03110100_0120
rows.name:
We're in the business of dispatching Drivers
and Blades all across the world.

rows.label: bf03110100_0130
rows.name:
Most of the kids are war orphans.
Took 'em in while on the job.

rows.label: bf03110100_0140
rows.name:
So you're saying that you
take them under your wing.

rows.label: bf03110100_0150
rows.name: Just till they're able to make it by themselves.

rows.label: bf03110100_0160
rows.name:
Some of 'em might grow up to be
Drivers, like ourselves.

rows.label: bf03110100_0170
rows.name: ...But then others might become tailors.

rows.label: bf03110100_0180
rows.name:
It doesn't matter what they wanna do with their lives.
We leave it up to them to decide.

rows.label: bf03110100_0190
rows.name: Aye. Us "Justice Busters" just wanna help.

rows.label: bf03110100_0200
rows.name: Good eggs, huh?

rows.label: bf03110100_0210
rows.name:
You said it.
I've been called worse.

rows.label: bf03110100_0220
rows.name:
Come on. Let's eat!
All this egg-talk is making me hungry.
